meanings.definition: The hand when closed tightly with the fingers bent into the palm.
meanings.sent1: He hit the table with his fist.
meanings.sent2: She held the coin in her fist.
meanings.sent3: The magician made a coin disappear with a flick of his fist.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her heart like a heavy fist.
meanings.sent5: The child's tiny fist grasped the toy tightly.

meanings.definition: To grip or clench tightly with the hand.
meanings.sent1: He would fist the rope to climb up.
meanings.sent2: She tried to fist the jar open.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to fist the dough to make it smooth.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree seemed to fist the earth.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler would fist his opponent's arm during the match.
